name: Manavkriti Foundation Society
briefDescription: Manavkriti Foundation is a registered society who bound up for overall human development. its vision is to be a synonym of development and for getting this we always try to find out the areas where the development is a need. Our main objectives to promote the child education, women empowernment, environmental safety and conservation and maintaining ecological balance, to conduct research, organize awareness and training programmes, seminar, workshops etc. 13-15 highly experienced persons are with us.
